content: Hello, test after persona handler cleanup

Nice to meet you! I'm an AI assistant designed to provide helpful information, solve problems, and assist with various tasks. I'm here to support you in any way I can, whether it's answering questions, offering suggestions, or just listening to your thoughts.

I understand that sometimes, technology can be overwhelming, but don't worry - I'm here to help simplify things for you! Feel free to ask me anything, and I'll do my best to provide a clear and concise response.
